price: Saa nkorͻfoͻ no na wͻnni (kyεfa biara) wͻ Daakye no mu no, gyesε Amanehunu gya; deε wͻyεε no wͻ (wiase yi) mu no (nyinaa) ayε kwa, na dwuma a na wͻdie no ho amma mfasoͻ.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَيۡسَ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِلَّا ٱلنَّارُۖ وَحَبِطَ مَا صَنَعُواْ فِيهَا وَبَٰطِلٞ مَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna laysa lahum fī al-ākhirati illā al-nāru waḥabiṭa mā ṣanaʿū fīhā wabāṭilun mā kānū yaʿmalūna
